channel.title: CVE Feed for WooCommerce -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WooCommerce -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-33332|2024-10-10T18:56:49.320Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20product%20vendors
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce Product Vendors plugin <= 2.1.76 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-35918|2024-10-10T17:23:09.026Z -- woocommerce -- bulk%20stock%20management
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce Bulk Stock Management plugin <= 2.2.33 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-33319|2024-10-10T18:57:18.825Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20follow-up%20emails%20%28automatewoo%29
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Follow-Up Emails (AutomateWoo) plugin <= 4.9.40 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-35881|2024-08-02T16:37:39.936Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20one%20page%20checkout
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce One Page Checkout allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WooCommerce One Page Checkout: from n/a through 2.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-35049|2024-08-02T16:17:04.207Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20stripe%20payment%20gateway
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway.This issue affects WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway: from n/a through 7.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37297|2024-08-02T03:50:56.092Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce
item.description: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce platform built on WordPress. A vulnerability introduced in WooCommerce 8.8 allows for cross-site scripting. A bad actor can manipulate a link to include malicious HTML & JavaScript content. While the content is not saved to the database, the links may be sent to victims for malicious purposes. The injected JavaScript could hijack content & data stored in the browser, including the session. The URL content is read through the `Sourcebuster.js` library and then inserted without proper sanitization to the classic checkout and registration forms. Versions 8.8.5 and 8.9.3 contain a patch for the issue. As a workaround, one may disable the Order Attribution feature.

item.title: CVE-2023-35049|2024-06-19T12:26:52.965Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20stripe%20payment%20gateway
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway.This issue affects WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway: from n/a through 7.4.0.
